description: The OVERRIDE_TIME_HX table contains information about order override time history.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IP_OVRD_TM_BY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who adjusted the times or schedule. If the times or schedule are adjusted and then the order is verified, it will contain the ID of the user who verified the order.

columns.name: OVRD_UPD_AT_TM
columns.description: This is the instant at which the times for the order were set.  If the times were adjusted and then the order was verified, the instant the order was verified will be stored.

columns.name: OVRD_TIMES
columns.description: Stores the override scheduled times for the order if the order has a specified frequency.

columns.name: OVRD_INST_NS_TM
columns.description: Stores the override schedule time for orders with a non-specified frequency.

columns.name: OVRD_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the override reason for adjusting the medication administration times.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: IP_OVRDTM_SRCDEP_ID
columns.description: The unique department ID of the department used to calculate the override times stored in the row.
